instructions: Place the dinner plate in the middle of the table
Place the dinner fork immediately to the left of the dinner plate
Place the salad fork immediately to the left of the dinner fork
Place the dinner knife immediately to the right of the dinner plate
Place the salad knife immediately to the right of the dinner knife
Place the soup spoon immediately to the right of the salad knife
Place the water glass at the top right of the dinner plate right above the dinner knife blade
Place the wine glass immediately to the right of the water glass
Place the wine glass immediately to the right of the first wine glass
Put the coffee cup immediately to the right of the soup spoon and right below the second wine glass
Place the bread plate immediately above the two forks to the top left of the dinner plate
Place the bread knife diagonally on the top right corner of the bread plate
Put the dessert fork horizontally with the prongs facing right above the dinner plate between the bread plate and the water glass
Place the dessert spoon horizontally with the bowl facing left above the dessert fork
Place the napkin vertically on top of the dinner plate
